archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0919
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Vodafone employee, when I am transferring some services from one customer to another, I want make sure that services not being trandsferred are retained and charged under the original owner, so that I don't lose money

properties.value: two OOTB processes one deals with ChoO for the particular service the other for whole account

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
